shapes3d.utils
Class TerrainCam

java.lang.Object
  shapes3d.utils.VCam
      shapes3d.utils.TerrainCam

public class TerrainCam
extends VCam

This class provides a simple camera tha can be used with the Terrain class. The movement is in the XZ plane and rotation is about the Y axis.

Author:
Peter Lager

Method Detail

adjustToTerrain

public void adjustToTerrain(Terrain t,
                            int tMode,
                            float heightAbove)
Will adjust the camera's position to ensure that it is over the terrain at a given height above it.

Parameters:
t - the terrain we want to use
tMode - Terrain.CLAMP or Terrain.WRAP
heightAbove - the height of the eye above the terrain
